content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a divorce case between two parties referred to as om and jm the court has made a final decision referred to as court dec but the details of the decision are not provided the joint assets and liabilities of the parties have been identified including a coowned real estate property shares in two companies and various movable properties the court has resolved to divide the assets and liabilities between the parties with one party taking sole ownership of the real estate property and shares in the companies and the other party being responsible for certain loan obligations one party will also compensate the other party with a specific amount of money the court has set a deadline for compliance with the judgment and has ordered the sale of jointly owned movable properties through a public auction the proceeds will be divided equally between the parties after deducting the costs of the auction the court has allowed for the transfer of ownership of the coowned real estate property to one party the land register has made a new entry reflecting this change om has filed a lawsuit requesting the division of joint property and the payment of maintenance the court will decide on the division of property and the amount of maintenance to be paid considering the evidence and justifications presented by both parties the court will also consider the financial situation of both parties the decision of the court can be appealed within 30 days the text also mentions the defendants bank accounts and income sources as well as the plaintiffs claim for alimony based on their health condition and inability to work the court will evaluate the evidence and determine if the plaintiff is eligible for alimony the court will also address the division of joint obligations and the payment of compensation to one party the court has ordered the defendant to pay a specific amount of money to the plaintiff within a reasonable deadline if not paid enforcement proceedings may be initiated the court has allowed for the sale of movable property through a public auction with the proceeds being divided equally between the parties the court has also considered the procedural costs of the case and has decided to divide them between the parties although the exact amount is not mentioned
